Html:
Hi Chinook,

I was looking for a nice demo database model to use with CUBRID Database (http://www.cubrid.org), so I found Chinook Database. I am planning to create its CUBRID version, so was wondering if the Chinook Database Model ported to CUBRID can be accepted by you afterwards. I will provide the script as well to auto install the database in the CUBRID Server.

Please let me know you answer.

Hi kadishmal,

Yes, of course we would like to support CRUBID. If you can provide the script it will be great.

Thank you!

Luis
